title: Jonathan Karl, Author of "Front Row at the Trump Show"
description:
ABC News' chief White House correspondent Jonathan Karl provided a behind the scenes look at President Trump’s administration. He was interviewed by Mike McCurry, former White House press secretary in the Clinton administration.
